    About this item

    • Unique 3 way action of Scalpe Pro provides 3 benefits - Dandruff removal, Strong hair & Smooth hair
    • The advanced fomulation of Scalpe Pro is made with Climbazole + ZPTO which attacks the root cause of dandruff and prevents recurrence
    • Climbazole targets the root of dandruff that is Malassezia, eliminates it from scalp and tackles its build-up. Thus helps remove dandruff and prevents its re-occurrence. ZPTO prevents dandruff causing microbes from producing scalp irritants relieving from itching, irritation accompanying dandruff
    • Contains Piroctone Olamine which Is known to improve hair shaft thickness, reducing hair fall due to breakage
    • Contains a conditioning base which helps prevent dryness even with daily use, making it the ideal choice for daily dandruff care
    • Suitable for Women & Men

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.

      Customers say

      Customers find the shampoo effective at removing dandruff and appreciate its quality, with one noting it's better than Loreal products. The shampoo receives positive feedback for its amazing scent, leaving hair soft and smooth, and one customer mentions it keeps hair silky and hydrated. While some customers report reduced itching, others experience increased itchiness, and the product can cause heavy hairfall. The value for money receives mixed reviews, with some finding it worth the price while others consider it overpriced.

      About this Item

      • Unique 3 way action of Scalpe Pro provides 3 benefits - Dandruff removal, Strong hair & Smooth hair
      • The advanced fomulation of Scalpe Pro is made with Climbazole + ZPTO which attacks the root cause of dandruff and prevents recurrence
      • Climbazole targets the root of dandruff that is Malassezia, eliminates it from scalp and tackles its build-up. Thus helps remove dandruff and prevents its re-occurrence. ZPTO prevents dandruff causing microbes from producing scalp irritants relieving from itching, irritation accompanying dandruff
      • Contains Piroctone Olamine which Is known to improve hair shaft thickness, reducing hair fall due to breakage
      • Contains a conditioning base which helps prevent dryness even with daily use, making it the ideal choice for daily dandruff care
      • Suitable for Women & Men

      Product description

      Scalpe Pro is a Daily Use Anti-Dandruff Shampoo specially designed with Climbazole which has a proven mechanism of action to eliminate dandruff at its source.
